stunts.stunt: By Degrading Espionage by 2 ranks, automatically Create the misleading Advantage "Utterly Destroyed" on the Second Foundation with 2 Free Invocations.

Because you command a secretive martial order of infiltrators, you can attack with Espionage to inflict military stress. When doing so, your Espionage degrades as if it were Warfare, and is restored the same way.
